attributes.description: Toothpick is made, packaged, and shipped in bulk from this location.  Company name of production - Jarden.  Made from wood produced in chinese forests and shipped product from nearby surrounding areas
attributes.title: Hongkong, China

attributes.description: Toothpick arrived to be chipped down and sold to new places for making goods from recycled material
attributes.title: Center Town Recycling

attributes.description: Toothpick is saturated with water and heat to allow decomposition or heated and chipped along with other wood products for mulching.
attributes.address: County Road 175 E, Princeton, IN 47670, USA
attributes.title: Gibson County Solid Waste Compost Yard

attributes.description: Toothpick is dumped along with other trash in landfill.  Decomp time is estimated to be 2 to 5 years due to excess waste and time for decomposition to start on surrounding materials
attributes.title: Laubscher Meadows Landfill
Evansville Indiana
attributes.description:
Toothpick arrives and is distributed to local grocery stores

Toothpick is then disposed of in either trash, recycling, or composting
